last_episode_to_air.name: Bae’s Revelations
last_episode_to_air.overview: With her besties by her side, Bae takes on the men she wants to bring to justice, and her own shame, in a big televised spectacle. Is Bae ready to bring it on?

name: Call Me Bae
overview: Bae, billionaire fashionista is disowned by her ultra-rich family, owing to a salacious scandal and for the first time in her life, has to fend for herself. On this journey, she overcomes stereotypes and discovers who she really is.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Downsized from heiress to hustler, Bella 'Bae' Chowdhary played by Ananya Panday discovers her most valuable assets aren’t her diamonds, but her street smarts and style. Broke, but refusing to be broken, she navigates the newsrooms of Mumbai, finding beaus, behens, and her better self while breaking big news.

episodes.name: The Golden Girl Messes Up
episodes.overview: A massive scandal turns Bella 'Bae' Chowdhury's perfect life upside down, as she downgrades from rich heiress to broke homeless. With her South Delhi family and friends disowning her, Bae finds herself on the streets, armed with little more than her fashion sense and fortitude. Where to next?

episodes.name: Bae in Bombay
episodes.overview: Bae’s search for a solution leads her to Mumbai, but it’s not going to be so easy to fix everything. When family fails her, it is fun new friends like Saira that prop her up. But her woes aren’t over as Bae girds herself to face the fire of an influential man.

episodes.name: Bae Gets to Work
episodes.overview: Bae takes on her first proper job as a journalist with Neel's help. She may have also found a flat and a flat mate in Tammarrah...and maybe even her first story.

episodes.name: Bae Tries to Fit In
episodes.overview: Bae is struggling with tussles with Tammarah at home, while Satyajit at work makes her life a living hell. To add to the confusion, a blast from her past shows up at her doorstep.

episodes.name: Triple Trouble For Bae
episodes.overview: Bae plunges into the investigation of an important story with help from Tammarrah, Saira and Prince, while her love life hangs on a precipice with Neel, Prince and Agastya in the mix.

episodes.name: Bae Tries to be a Journalist
episodes.overview: Bae’s spirit to get to the bottom of the story is deterred when she finds herself forced to confront the past she has been working to move on from. When she lands on her face, help comes from an unexpected source.

episodes.name: Bae Cracks the Code
episodes.overview: Reinvigorated, Bae goes all in on her investigation to help the person who trusted her, leading her and her friends to land up in a soup with a dangerous man.

episodes.name: Bae’s Revelations
episodes.overview: With her besties by her side, Bae takes on the men she wants to bring to justice, and her own shame, in a big televised spectacle. Is Bae ready to bring it on?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Downsized from heiress to hustler, Bella 'Bae' Chowdhary played by Ananya Panday discovers her most valuable assets aren’t her diamonds, but her street smarts and style. Broke, but refusing to be broken, she navigates the newsrooms of Mumbai, finding beaus, behens, and her better self while breaking big news.
